node.title: Episode 2- Matteson Mission School & VIDA Internacional
node.description:
This episode features two OCI ministries. The first, Matteson Mission School, is located in Norway and trains young people to become full-time missionaries. It is their goal that Matteson graduates become resources for existing ministries or instrumental in starting new ones supporting the Seventh-day Adventist Church, preparing people for Christ’s imminent return.

 

The second ministry is VIDA Internacional, located in Honduras. VIDA also has a mission training program, with young people from all over Central America attending. The team also runs an English-language elementary school, which is a valuable connection with their community.
